game_info.name: Motherload Clone
game_info.description: Mars mining game. Control drill pod with arrows/WASD. Drill left/right/down to collect minerals. Fly up to surface. Sell at processor, buy fuel, upgrade equipment. Manage fuel to avoid getting stranded.

core_loop.description: Drill underground -> Collect minerals -> Return to surface before fuel runs out -> Sell minerals -> Buy fuel -> Buy upgrades -> Dig deeper -> Repeat

movement.description: Left/Right = move/drill sideways, Up = fly, Down = drill down

primary_action.description: Directional drilling based on movement keys

key_features.name: Directional Drilling
key_features.test_method: Press left/right/down to drill in corresponding direction

key_features.name: Fuel Management
key_features.test_method: Fuel depletes while flying up, refill at surface

key_features.name: Mineral Collection
key_features.test_method: Drill minerals to add to cargo, sell at processor
